SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT362
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the financial institutions, Party A and Party B, who have agreed to a single or cross currency interest rate derivative transaction, including caps, collars and floors.
This message may be used to: a) advise the details of the determination of the floating interest rate(s) b) advise the details of the payment of interest at the end of an interest period c) cancel a previously sent reset/advice d) correct errors in a previously sent reset/advice.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent reset/advice with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 362 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 362 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent reset/advice. Used to cancel an MT 362 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 362 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates the same previously sent reset/advice. Used to inform the Receiver that a reset/advice was already sent by telex, fax or SWIFT

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: New reset/advice. Used to send an MT 362 for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 362 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 362 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: The Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, the Sender and the Receiver are the principals.

Validation.Comment: Settlement Method must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48):

Code.Name: GROSS
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be paid in full.

Code.Name: NET
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be netted, resulting in a single payment when due dates coincide.

Validation.Comment: Type of Swap must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47):

Code.Name: CAPBUYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the cap and paid the premium.

Code.Name: CAPSELLER
Code.Description: Party A sold the cap and received the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARBYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the collar and paid the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARSLLR
Code.Description: Party A sold the collar and received the premium.

Code.Name: FLOORBUYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the floor and paid the premium.

Code.Name: FLOORSLLER
Code.Description: Party A sold the floor and received the premium.

Code.Name: FIXEDFIXED
Code.Description: IRS or CS where both parties pay fixed rates.

Code.Name: FIXEDFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS or CS where party A pays fixed and receives floating rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFIXED
Code.Description: IRS or CS where, party A pays floating and receives fixed rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS or CS where both Parties pay floating rates.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

SwiftSequence.Name: B
B
SwiftSequence.Description: Interest Rate/Principal Payable by Party B

Validation.Comment: Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).

Sign must not be used if Rate is zero (Error code(s): T14).

Sign must not be used if Rate is zero (Error code(s): T14).

Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: FC-18A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Field 18A of sequence C, Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F."

fieldvalidation.name: FE-18A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Field 18A of sequence E, Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In field 22C (in sequence A), Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the sequences B or D must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When the settlement method, ie, the second subfield of field 23A, is 'NET', either sequence C or E must be present, but not both."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the sequences C or E must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "NET", If(C.$size > 0, C[0].F18A[0].Number == 1, E.$size > 0 && E[0].F18A[0].Number == 1), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When the settlement method, ie, the second subfield of field 23A, is 'NET', the payments block (i.e. fields 30F---57a) within sequence C or E must occur only once. i.e. field 18A in seq. C or E must be =1."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "GROSS", If(C.$size > 0, C[0].F18A[0].Number < 4, true) && If(E.$size > 0, E[0].F18A[0].Number < 4, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When the settlement method, ie, the second subfield of field 23A, is 'GROSS', the payments block (i.e. fields 30F---57a) within sequence C or E cannot occur more than three times. i.e field 18A must be <4."

fieldvalidation.name: C6-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code of the fields 33F and 32H in sequence B must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C6-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency codes of the fields 33F and 32H in sequence D must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, if field 56a is not present in an occurrence of sequence C1, then field 86a is not allowed in the same occurrence. Otherwise, it is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, if field 56a is not present in an occurrence of sequence E1, then field 86a is not allowed in the same occurrence. Otherwise, it is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The related reference must be present for an amendment or cancellation. Thus, in sequence A, field 21 is mandatory if field 22A contains one of the following codes: AMND, CANC. Otherwise it is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-A
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FIXEDFIXED", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size == 0 && B[0].F37L.$size == 0, true) && If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size == 0 && D[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is FIXEDFIXED, then the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence B, 37L in sequence B, 37J in sequence D and 37L in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-B
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FLOATFIXED", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size == 0 && B[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is FLOATFIXED, then the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence B and 37L in sequence B."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-C
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FIXEDFLOAT", If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size == 0 && D[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is FIXEDFLOAT, then the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence D and 37L in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-D
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "CAPBUYER", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size > 0 && B[0].F37L.$size == 0, true) && If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size == 0 && D[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is CAPBUYER, then field 37J in sequence B is mandatory and the following fields are not allowed: 37L in sequence B, 37J in sequence D and 37L in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-E
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "CAPSELLER", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size == 0 && B[0].F37L.$size == 0, true) && If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size > 0 && D[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is CAPSELLER, then field 37J in sequence D is mandatory and the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence B, 37L in sequence B and 37L in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-F
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FLOORBUYER", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size == 0 && B[0].F37L.$size > 0, true) && If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size == 0 && D[0].F37L.$size == 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is FLOORBUYER, then field 37L in sequence B is mandatory and the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence B, 37J in sequence D and 37L in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-G
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "FLOORSLLER", If(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37J.$size == 0 && B[0].F37L.$size == 0, true) && If(D.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size == 0 && D[0].F37L.$size > 0, true), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is FLOORSLLER, then field 37L in sequence D is mandatory and the following fields are not allowed: 37J in sequence B, 37L in sequence B and 37J in sequence D."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-H1
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "COLLARBYER" && B.$size > 0 && D.$size > 0, If(B[0].F37J.$size > 0 && B[0].F37L.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size > 0 || D[0].F37L.$size > 0, If(B[0].F37J.$size > 0, D[0].F37L.$size > 0, B[0].F37L.$size > 0 && D[0].F37J.$size > 0)), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARBYER and if sequences B and D are both present, then in each sequence B and D, a minimum of one field 37J or 37L must be present and the presence of these fields should conform to the following conditions: 1) in sequence B if fields 37J and 37L are both present, then in sequence D either field 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory; 2) in sequence B if field 37J is present and field 37L is not present, then in sequence D field 37L is mandatory and field 37J is optional; 3) in sequence B if field 37J is not present and field 37L is present, then in sequence D field 37J is mandatory and field 37L is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-H2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARBYER and if sequence B is not present, then in sequence D, either 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-H3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARBYER and if sequence D is not present, then in sequence B, either 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-I1
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "COLLARSLLR" && B.$size > 0 && D.$size > 0, If(B[0].F37J.$size > 0 && B[0].F37L.$size > 0, D[0].F37J.$size > 0 || D[0].F37L.$size > 0, If(B[0].F37J.$size > 0, D[0].F37L.$size > 0, B[0].F37L.$size > 0 && D[0].F37J.$size > 0)), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARSLLR and if sequences B and D are both present, then in each sequence B and D, a minimum of one field 37J or 37L must be present and the presence of these fields should conform to the following conditions: 1) in sequence B if fields 37J and 37L are both present, then in sequence D either field 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory; 2) in sequence B if field 37J is present and field 37L is not present, then in sequence D field 37L is mandatory and field 37J is optional; 3) in sequence B if field 37J is not present and field 37L is present, then in sequence D field 37J is mandatory and field 37L is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-I2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARSLLR and if sequence B is not present, then in sequence D, either 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-I3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In addition to taking C1 into account, the cap and floor rates are mandatory in the case of a cap, floor or collar; otherwise they are optional. Thus, if subfield 1 of field 23A (in sequence A) is COLLARSLLR and if sequence D is not present, then in sequence B, either 37J or 37L or both is (are) mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 362 Single Currency Interest Rate Derivative Confirmation. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 362 Single Currency Interest Rate Derivative Confirmation. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-29A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"
